name: Bank of America Corporation
description: Bank of America Corporation is one of the largest financial institutions in the United States, serving millions of individual consumers, small- and mid-sized businesses, and large corporations. Founded in 1904 and headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Bank of America offers a comprehensive range of banking, investing, asset management, and other financial and risk management products and services. The company operates through various segments, including Consumer Banking, Global Wealth & Investment Management, Global Banking, and Global Markets. Bank of America is committed to responsible growth, focusing on sustainable practices and community engagement. The bank is a leader in digital banking and financial technology, providing customers with innovative solutions like mobile banking, online investing, and AI-driven financial advice. With a strong emphasis on customer service and accessibility, Bank of America aims to deliver a seamless banking experience while also prioritizing environmental, social, and governance (ESG) standards. The bank is actively involved in philanthropic efforts, supporting various initiatives that promote economic mobility and community development.
